description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Prepare to be amazed! This incredible, colorful collection contains 100 of the world’s most powerful optical illusions. They defy the rules of space, but captivate the mind. These mind-boggling images spring into action, vibrating, pulsing, and spinning right on your TV screen!
description.short: Prepare to be amazed! This incredible, colorful collection contains 100 of the world’s most powerful optical illusions. They defy the rules of space, but captivate the mind. These mind-boggling images spring into action, vibrating, pulsing, and spinning right on your TV screen!
